summary.span: 描述并表示一个枚举类型。

span.span: Describes and represents an enumeration type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，有必要定义使用的枚举因为发出其元素是类型的枚举而不是枚举类型。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is necessary to define enumerations using because emits enumerations whose elements are of type instead of the enumeration type. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，发出其元素具有正确的类型的枚举。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, emits enumerations whose elements have the correct type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造的动态程序集中，使用枚举`EnumBuilder`。The following code example demonstrates the construction of an enumeration within a dynamic assembly, using `EnumBuilder`. 该示例定义了名为枚举`Elevation`，使用的基础类型为，并创建两个元素： `Low`，值为 0，和`High`，值为 1。The example defines an enumeration named `Elevation`, with an underlying type of , and creates two elements: `Low`, with a value of 0, and `High`, with a value of 1. 创建的类型后，将程序集保存同名`TempAssembly.dll`。After the type has been created, the assembly is saved with the name `TempAssembly.dll`. 你可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)其检查此程序集的内容。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the contents of this assembly. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中之前, 此代码示例不会生成正确的枚举。Prior to the .NET Framework version 2.0, this code example does not produce a correct enumeration. [!code-cpp[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/CPP/modulebuilder_defineenum.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/CS/modulebuilder_defineenum.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/VB/modulebuilder_defineenum.vb#1)]
